item.title: Python decorator로 간단한 profiler 구현하기
item.description: 간단한 프로파일링을 할 수 있는 profiler를 Python decorator로 구현한다. Index profiler 구현 계기 profiler 구현 개선해야 하는 부분 profiler 구현 계기 Django 환경에서 unittest를 하며 간단하게 퍼포먼스를 측정하고 싶었다. 아주 간단하게 프

item.title: (en) Test Spring boot with Junit5
item.description: Test Spring boot with Junit5 Index Why unit test? Implement unit test Why unit test? Making test code is always big burden for me. No time for writing test code, and also don’t know how. What is @SpringBootTest and Junit? The main point of making test code has to be united! Do not test whole flow! TBH I’ve usually done test e2e way. I thought test with spring boot test code is so heavy that I have to wait for server reload a lot. And now I know it happened because I tried to test entire program. It is just

item.title: (en) Load static/dynamic resource Spring jar
item.description: Spring jar에서 static/dynamic 리소스를 로드하는 방법을 다룬다 Index How to load static/dynamic resource in Spring jar Fun fact How to load static/dynamic resource in Spring jar First case: Static resource Roughly 4 months age, I was assigned to make function with excel. It was like this. I had made a template excel in advance and my colleagues downloaded it and filled it. After that, I read it and inserted data to database.
